item.title: [R] Awkward AIO Miner!
item.dc:creator: @NCDS NCDS
item.description:
@NCDS wrote:

[quote=“yo123, post:10, topic:413952”][quote author=Newty link=topic=499215.msg3753562#msg3753562 date=1316234454]

[quote author=yo123 link=topic=499215.msg3753554#msg3753554 date=1316233710]

use color or use reflection, it’s still going through SMART you dipshit… the game is being run differently now. hell I ran 10 bots from 1 IP for 15 hours using a half-assed RSBot script for a couple weeks… or I could’ve ran 2 bots from dif IPs using color and direct mouse control ohwait I’m not fucking retarded

Are you implying that the only way to play Runescape is to use SMART? Aside from direct mouse control being extremely easy to work around if you’re not retarded, SRL is not made for running 15 bot on one computer. It’s about laying low and not get caught, rather than reap as much as you can before you get banned.
[/quote]you don’t need to lay low anymore, WAY TO READ MY POST, PEDRO

Why aren’t you banned yet? Your a bigger faggot then cumescape
[/quote]My a bigger faggot and then I cumescape? you’re a fucking idiot[/quote]
So… what have you ever made?

Read full topic

use color or use reflection, it’s still going through SMART you dipshit… the game is being run differently now. hell I ran 10 bots from 1 IP for 15 hours using a half-assed RSBot script for a couple weeks… or I could’ve ran 2 bots from dif IPs using color and direct mouse control ohwait I’m not fucking retarded

item.title: [R] Awkward AIO Miner!
item.dc:creator: @akwardsaw akwardsaw
item.description:
@akwardsaw wrote:

ripped off of the thread at http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=64027:

Hello, I haven’t made a script in a while(because i always forget/ don’t care about fixing or updating them) so I decided to make a simple mining script. Eventually it will be an AIO, seeing as all i have to do is plug in paths and potentially IDs, but not right now(their tedious, and i already got enough spots ;))

Features:
Reflection
Antiban
Dwarf Resource mine
Multiplayer (haven’t tested)
Easy to fix/ add stuff to. I use a somewhat template method in the script for moddifications
SRL Stats

Locations:
Dwarf Resource
Lumby mine
Draynor mine
Draynor clay
VWB
VEB
Power mining - select areas, explained below

Future:
More locations, like Rimmington, mine guild, ect
coal bag
possibly a “straight out of tut island set up” thing
priority mining
possibly a form

Proggy:

Player: ward Loads: 21 Mining: coal Exp gained: 29400 Time running: 1 Hours, 40 Minutes and 53 Seconds
stopped manually, had to fix an SRL stats bug

Bugs:
Sometimes i’ve noticed that it doesn’t always bank in dwarf resource, although its rare
walking to VEM messes up, not sure why, possibly because of lag while passing through the gate

Power Mining:
Due to the recent mining graphical update, every mining area has 3 different ids for each ore, that changes in every mining area (dwarf mine ores arent the same as the ones in varrok, same with lumby)

To make sure you are using the correct IDs, it’s recommended to only power mine in the available areas. I’m to lazy to just add color finding

[code=pascal]program Untitled;
{$DEFINE SMART}
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/stats.simba}
{$i srl/srl/misc/reports.scar}
{.include Reflection/Reflection.simba}
//{.include Reflection/core/refpaint.simba}

const
StatsUserId = ‘’;
StatsUserPass = ‘’;
relocate_player = true; //will go to rock if on minimap but not on main screen

{available for locations: use these in set up
dwarf resource – pick MUST be equiped
lumby swamp
draynor
draynor clay
vwb
veb
power – use for power mining
}
const //use these in set up
CLAY = 0;
TIN = 1;
COPPER = 2;
IRON = 3;
COAL = 4;
GOLD = 5;
MITH = 6;
ADAMANT = 7;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
//Disguise(‘Windows Live Messenger’);

HowManyPlayers:= 1;
CurrentPlayer:= 0;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

Smart_Server := 20;
Smart_Members := false;
Smart_Signed := true;
Smart_SuperDetail := False;

Players[0].Name := ‘’; // Username.
Players[0].Pass := ‘’; // Password.
Players[0].Nick := ‘’; // 2-4 letters of Username (that are not capital letters or numbers).
Players[0].Pin := ‘’;
Players[0].Strings[0] := ‘veb’; //valids are above
Players[0].Integers[0] := copper; //rock type //integers[10] = loads done
Players[0].Integers[1] := 20; //loads to do
Players[0].Booleans[0] := true; //pick equiped
Players[0].Active := true;

end;

procedure A_Debug(text: string);
begin
writeln(’[’ + thetime + '] ’ + players[currentplayer].nick + ’ ’ + text);
end;

Procedure AkwardAntiBan;
begin
if LevelUp then
stats_IncVariable(‘Total Levels Gained’, 1);
case random(60) of
0: Gametab(randomrange(tab_Combat, tab_Notes));
2: wait(1000 + random(3000));
3: begin
MakeCompass(IntToStr(random(361)));
SleepAndMoveMouse(1000+random(500));
MakeCompass(IntToStr(random(361)));
end;
end;
end;

type
TProc = record
bank: Function : Boolean;
end;

var
main : TProc;
oreids : TIntegerArray;

function MeNearTile(tile : TTile; dist : Integer) : Boolean;
var
me :TMe;
begin
me := GetMe;
result := DistanceFrom(TileToPoint(tile)) <= dist;
end;

function a_WalkPath(path : TTileArray) : Boolean;
var
i, c : Integer;
tp, ntp : TPoint;
begin
if RunEnergy(50) then setrun(true);
if MeNearTile(path[high(path)], 5) then
begin

result := true;
exit;

end;
for i := 0 to high(path) do
begin
tp := TileToMM(path[i]);
if i < high(path) then
begin
ntp := TileToMM(path[i + 1]);
if MeNearTile(tile(ntp.x, ntp.y), 1) then
continue;
end;
if not rs_OnMinimap(tp.x, tp.y) then
begin
A_Debug('tile not on map: ’ + inttostr(i));
continue;
end;
mouse(tp.x, tp.y, 5, 5, true);
if i < high(path) then
begin
ntp := TileToMM(path[i + 1]);
while not rs_OnMinimap(ntp.x, ntp.y) do
begin
ntp := TileToMM(path[i + 1]);
wait(100 + random(50));
r_findrandoms;
inc©;
if c > 300 then
begin
result := false;
exit;
end;
if not ismoving then continue;
end;
end else
r_flag;
end;
result := true;
a_debug(‘At location!’);
end;

function dr_bank : boolean;
var
btile : TTile;
tp : TPoint;
begin
//1043, 4578 1059, 4573
result := true;
if not invfull then exit;
if not a_WalkPath([tile(1059, 4573), tile(1043, 4578)]) then
begin
result := false;
exit;
end;
r_flag;
if not TileOnMS(tile(1042, 4578), 0) then
WalkToTile(tile(1042, 4578), 0, 0);
tp := tiletoms(tile(1042, 4578), 0);
mmouse(tp.x, tp.y, 5, 5);
wait(100 + random(500));
if isuptext(‘ank’) then
begin
getmousepos(tp.x, tp.y);
mouse(tp.x, tp.y, 0, 0, true);
end;
while isuptext(‘ank’) do
begin
writeln(1);
wait(1000);
end;
mouse(343, 277, 3, 3, true);
wait(500 + random(500));
mouse(434, 42, 3, 3, true);
while not gametab(tab_Inv) do
begin
R_FindRandoms;
wait(10);
end;
result := invempty;
if result then
stats_IncVariable(‘Times Banked’, 1);
end;

function gotobank : boolean;
var
thepath : TTileArray;
begin
case lowercase(players[currentplayer].Strings[0]) of
‘lumby swamp’ : thepath := [tile(3233, 3154), tile(3241, 3170), tile(3255, 3173),
tile(3269, 3177), tile(3269, 3168)];

'draynor' : thepath := [tile(3146, 3147), tile(3150, 3152), tile(3149, 3166),
                        tile(3149, 3176), tile(3146, 3189), tile(3136, 3198),
                        tile(3129, 3206), tile(3119, 3215), tile(3110, 3224),
                        tile(3105, 3236), tile(3104, 3248), tile(3093, 3248),
                        tile(3092, 3245)];

'draynor clay' : thepath := [tile(3140, 3317), tile(3133, 3306), tile(3123, 3296),
                            tile(3110, 3290), tile(3105, 3277), tile(3103, 3263),
                            tile(3103, 3250),tile(3093, 3248)];

'vwb' : thepath := [tile(3180, 3371), tile(3181, 3381), tile(3175, 3394),
                    tile(3171, 3407), tile(3172, 3418), tile(3172, 3427),
                    tile(3185, 3430), tile(3182, 3436)];

'veb' : thepath := [tile(3284, 3366), tile(3284, 3371), tile(3293, 3381),
                    tile(3291, 3397), tile(3288, 3412), tile(3285, 3425),
                    tile(3276, 3429), tile(3262, 3429), tile(3253, 3429),
                    tile(3253, 3420)];

end;
result := a_WalkPath(thepath);
end;

function normbank : boolean;
var
dabank : string;
begin
result := true;
if not InvFull then exit;
if not gotobank then
begin
A_Debug(‘messed up going to bank!’);
exit;
end;
case lowercase(players[currentplayer].Strings[0]) of
‘lumby swamp’ : dabank := ‘akb’;
‘draynor’ : dabank := ‘db’;
‘draynor clay’ : dabank := ‘db’;
‘vwb’ : dabank := ‘vwb’;
‘veb’ : dabank := ‘veb’;
end;
flag;
r_flag;
if not OpenBankFast(dabank) then
if not R_OpenBankBooth(dabank) then
begin
A_Debug(‘failed to open bank’);
exit;
end;
if players[currentplayer].Booleans[0] then
depositall
else
Deposit(2, 28, ‘all’);
closebank;
result := invcount <= 1;
if result then
stats_IncVariable(‘Times Banked’, 1);
end;

{function LRC_mine : boolean;
var
pathstobank : array of TTileArray;
depositids : Tintegerarray;
location, i, j : integer;
begin
case Players[0].Integers[0] of
COALDEPO : depositids := [];
GOLDDEPO : depositids := [];
end;
pathstobank[0] := [];
pathstobank[1] := [];
location := 0; //bank
for j := 0 to 1 do
begin
a_Walkpath(pathstowalk[j]);
rockarr := GetObjectsByIDEx(oreids, OBJECT_TYPE_INTERACTABLE, 5);
for i := 0 to high(rockarr) do
begin
if TileOnMM(rockarr[i].tile) then
begin
WalkToTile(rockarr[i].tile, 0, 0);
location := 1; //rocks
break;
end;
end;
if location = 1 then
break;
end;

end; }

function domine : boolean;
var
tta : TTileArray;
tp : TPoint;
rockarr : TRSObjectArray;
i : integer;
begin
if not loggedin then loginplayer;
case lowercase(Players[currentplayer].Strings[0]) of
‘dwarf resource’ : case Players[currentplayer].Integers[0] of
MITH : begin
tp := tiletoms(tile(1047, 4577), 0);
MouseFlag(tp.x, tp.y, 5, 5, 0);
wait(1500 + random(500));
end;
COAL : tta := [tile(1057, 4573), tile(1066, 4573)];
end;
‘lumby swamp’ :begin
tta := [tile(3269, 3168),tile(3263, 3175),tile(3249, 3169),
tile(3239, 3162),tile(3231, 3151),tile(3227, 3148)];

                end;
'draynor' :begin
             tta :=  [ tile(3092, 3245), tile(3103, 3249), tile(3106, 3235),
                      tile(3109, 3225), tile(3109, 3225), tile(3118, 3216),
                      tile(3124, 3208), tile(3131, 3205), tile(3140, 3196),
                      tile(3147, 3185), tile(3149, 3172), tile(3147, 3160),
                      tile(3150, 3152), tile(3146, 3147)];

          end;

'draynor clay' : begin
  tta := [tile(3093, 3249),tile(3103, 3250),tile(3104, 3266),
                         tile(3108, 3281),tile(3109, 3285),tile(3118, 3296),
                         tile(3129, 3304),tile(3138, 3312),tile(3140, 3317)];

end;
'vwb' :
begin
  tta := [tile(3185, 3432),tile(3176, 3429),tile(3170, 3414),tile(3171, 3399),
                tile(3174, 3385),tile(3182, 3374),tile(3180, 3371)];

end;
'veb' :
begin
  tta := [tile(3253, 3420), tile(3253, 3429), tile(3264, 3429), tile(3272, 3429),
          tile(3281, 3429), tile(3288, 3418), tile(3290, 3408), tile(3289, 3396),
          tile(3292, 3389), tile(3295, 3379), tile(3287, 3373), tile(3285, 3366)];

end;
'power' : wait(0);

end;
if lowercase(Players[currentplayer].Strings[0]) = ‘power’ then
result := true else
result := a_WalkPath(tta);
if not result then
begin
A_Debug(‘messed up walking to mine’);
exit;
end;
repeat
if not loggedin then loginplayer;
r_findrandoms;
AkwardAntiBan;
rockarr := GetObjectsByIDEx(oreids, OBJECT_TYPE_INTERACTABLE, 32);
for i := 0 to high(rockarr) do
begin
if not tileonms(rockarr[i].tile, 0) then
if relocate_player then
r_WebWalk(rockarr[i].tile);

  tp := tiletoms(rockarr[i].Tile, 0);
  MMouse(tp.x, tp.y, 2, 2);
  if WaitUptext('ine', 5000) then break else
  begin
    inc(i);
    continue;
  end;
end;
if i > high(rockarr) then
  continue;
getmousepos(tp.x, tp.y);
mouse(tp.x, tp.y, 0, 0, true);
r_flag;
wait(700 + random(500));
while CharacterAnimating do
begin
  wait(100);
  AkwardAntiBan;
end;
AkwardAntiBan;

until invfull;
result := true;
end;

function pw_bank : boolean;
begin
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Booleans[0] then
dropall
else
DropAllExcept([1]);
result := true;
end;

var
loads : integer;

procedure prog;
var
exp : extended;
rock : string;
begin
case Players[currentplayer].Integers[0] of
MITH : begin
exp := 80;
rock := ‘mith’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Mith Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
COAL : begin
exp := 50;
rock := ‘coal’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Coal Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
CLAY : begin
exp := 5;
rock := ‘clay’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Clay (Mined)’, 28);
end;
TIN : begin
exp := 17.5;
rock := ‘tin’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Tin Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
COPPER : begin
exp := 17.5;
rock := ‘copper’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Copper Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
IRON : begin
exp := 35;
rock := ‘iron’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Iron Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
GOLD : begin
exp := 65;
rock := ‘gold’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Gold Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
ADAMANT : begin
exp := 95;
rock := ‘adamant’;
stats_IncVariable(‘Adamant Ore (Mined)’, 28);
end;
end;
stats_IncVariable(‘Mining EXP (Gained)’, 28 * round(exp));
stats_IncVariable(‘Loads Done’, 1);
stats_Commit;
writeln('Player: ’ + players[CurrentPlayer].Nick);
writeln('Loads: ’ + inttostr(loads));

writeln('Mining: ’ + rock);
writeln('Exp gained: ’ + inttostr(loads * 28 * round(exp)));
Players[CurrentPlayer].Integers[11] := loads * 28 * round(exp);
writeln('Time running: ’ + MsToTime(Players[CurrentPlayer].worked, Time_Short));
end;

procedure NextP;
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Active := False;
LogOut;
end;

procedure SetupLoop;
begin
case lowercase(Players[CurrentPlayer].Strings[0]) of
‘power’ : main.bank := @pw_bank;
‘dwarf resource’ : main.bank := @dr_bank

else
main.bank := @normbank;
end;
end;

begin
declareplayers;
setupsrl;
setupreflectionex(true);
SetupSRLStats(105, StatsUserId, StatsUserPass);

repeat
Setuploop;
case Players[currentplayer].Integers[0] of
CLAY : oreids := [10577, 10579, 10578, 14905, 14905, 15504, 15503, 15505, 5766, 5767];
COPPER : oreids := [9709, 9708, 9710, 14907, 14906, 11960, 11962, 11961, 3027, 3229, 5779, 5780, 5781];
TIN : oreids := [9716, 9714, 11933, 11934, 11935, 11959, 11957, 11958, 3038, 3245, 5777, 5776, 5778];
IRON : oreids := [9718, 9719, 9717, 14913, 14914, 2092, 2093, 11954, 11956, 11955, 5773, 5774, 5775];
MITH : oreids := [3280, 3041, 5784, 5785, 32439, 32438, 32440];
COAL : oreids :=[11930, 11932, 11931, 2096, 2097, 11964, 3032, 3233, 5770, 5771, 5772, 32426, 32427, 32428];
ADAMANT : oreids := [3273, 3040, 5782, 5783];
GOLD : oreids := [9720, 9722, 5768, 5769];
end;
if not loggedin then loginplayer;
marktime(Players[currentplayer].Worked);
setangle(true);
loads := 0;
repeat
//R_DebugObjects(OBJECT_TYPE_INTERACTABLE, true, clRed);
a_debug(‘banking’);
if not main.bank() then
begin
A_Debug(‘messed up banking, switch players’);
nextp;
break;
end;
a_debug(‘banking done, mining now’);
if not domine then
begin
A_Debug(‘messed up mining, switch players’);
nextp;
break;
end;

  clicknorth(true);
  inc(loads);
  inc(Players[currentplayer].Integers[10]);
  prog;
  if loads >= Players[currentplayer].Integers[1] then
  begin
    nextp;
    break;
  end;
until loads >= Players[currentplayer].Integers[1];

SRLPlayerReport( ResultDebugBox, 0, false,
[True, False, False, False, False, True],
[‘Script’, ‘Rock Mined’, ‘Loads’, ‘Exp Gained’],
[0], [0, 10, 11], [], [] );
until AllPlayersInactive;
end.[/code]
